resources.string: Allow scrolling back to previous days
Remind me to fill my data sending a reminder at the specified time
Developed by Gabriele Viglianisi. Please report any problem to vigliag@gmail.com. Source code available at https://github.com/vigliag/LogMyDay
This app allows you to associate some data and notes to each day. This data can then be exported in the json format. Some statistics can be seen in the Stats page
The main page displays the data for a given day, with an editable field for every Field defined in the preferences. \nIf enabled in preferences, you can swipe back to previous days.
